Description: 
------------ 
Dreamcast's library is a compilation of popular titles like Crazy Taxi for Dreamcast, Sonic Adventure, SEGA Bass Fishing and Space Channel 5: Part 2. Players can enjoy four very different experiences Dreamcast, jump behind the wheel of Crazy Taxi, to take things a little slower to attract your fish before catching them hook, line and sinker with Sega Bass Fishing. Another option is to take over as intergalactic reporter Ulala of Space Channel 5: Part 2 and dancing their way past the evil rogues pace, or that everything is done at the first exit time of Sonic for Dreamcast, Sonic Adventure!
